name: Left Behind (itch) (hadongee)
description:
“Left Behind” is a short Metroid-vania style game developed for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam. You play as an assistance robot, the only one left on a ship abandoned in the midst of space. You start with only one module and must explore the station for your remaining parts to escape on the last escape pod out! But be careful, you can use only one of your modules at once! Careful planning and thinking is required.

- Programming by Carl Cockerall
- Spritework and Sound by Jethro Proposch
- Design by Carl Cockerall & Jethro Proposch
